thread.section_title: 1st Art-gallery Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 1st Art-gallery | www.1st-art-gallery.com
thread.title: Pamela Ziss

author: Pamela Ziss
title: Pamela Ziss
text:
This is the forth painting we have purchased from 1st Art Gallery. We have been very impressed with the exquisite level of detail. This one in particular features the woman wearing a sheer garment and it actually looks as if it is blowing in the wind.
We are very proud to have it hanging in our dining room, and visible as guests enter our home. Their reaction is always, "wow!"
